49:50 That question really tricked a lot of people, including me

EPA defines the acidic side of "corrosive" as less than or equal to 2, not the 3 in the video... See https://www.epa.gov/hw/defining-hazardous-waste-listed-characteristic-and-mixed-radiological-wastes . As a side note, I believe the 12.5 number (which is correct) is due to lobbying from Coca-Cola to allow pH 12...
